verses.verse: How long, <WH3068> Yahweh? Will you forget <WH7911> me forever? <WH5331> How long will you hide <WH5641> your face from me? <WH6440>
How long shall I take <WH7896> counsel <WH6098> in my soul, <WH5315> having sorrow <WH3015> in my heart <WH3824> every day? <WH3119> How long shall my enemy <WH341> triumph over me? <WH7311>
Behold, <WH5027> and answer <WH6030> me, <WH3068> Yahweh, my God. <WH430> Give light <WH215> to my eyes, <WH5869> lest I sleep <WH3462> in death; <WH4194>
Lest my enemy <WH341> say, <WH559> "I have prevailed <WH3201> against him; <WH6862>" Lest my adversaries rejoice <WH1523> when I fall. <WH4131>
But I trust <WH982> in your loving kindness. <WH2617> My heart <WH3820> rejoices <WH1523> in your salvation. <WH3444>
I will sing <WH7891> to Yahweh, <WH3068> because he has been good to me. <WH1580>
